title: The Blade of Romance
overview: Song Weiwei, the daughter of the first general of the Chen Kingdom, is determined to avenge the death of her father and the destruction of her kingdom. She replaces Wen Wenrou, the sister of Wen Zhiyuan, the most favored prince of the Liang Kingdom. She gradually gains Zhiyuan's trust, and even makes him fall in love with her. With the help of Wen Zhibai, who is fighting for the throne against Zhiyuan, she gradually dismantles Zhiyuan's plan of ascending the throne, succeeding in her revenge. However, she realizes that Zhiyuan has really fallen in love with her, and her crush has also been silently guarding her...
